metaTags.metaTitle: Data Protection | Mitigate Risk & Strengthen Compliance | Cloudflare One
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare One for Data Protection offers a unified suite to protect data everywhere across web, SaaS, and private applications. Built on and delivered across our entire global network, Cloudflare One's data protection suite is architected for the risks of modern coding and AI.

relatedBlades.title: Protect Your Data
relatedBlades.subtitle: Unified protection for data everywhere
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Regain visibility and controls over sensitive data__ across web, SaaS, and private application environments
- __Stay at the forefront of modern data risks__, like emerging AI tools and source code exposure

features.title: Simplified management and connectivity
features.description: Unify visibility and controls on one platform and network. Flexible options to send traffic for enforcement (API-based scans, with or without a device client). Many practical ways to deploy, so protection is functional  not shelware.

features.title: Frictionless UX. No productivity trade-offs
features.description: Fast, reliable, and consistent enforcement of data controls for end users with single-pass inspection across our global network. Security never disrupts work. Proven [faster than peer vendors](https://blog.cloudflare.com/spotlight-on-zero-trust/).

features.title: Built to innovate alongside your evolving needs
features.description: Our programmable network architecture enables us to build new capabilities quickly. Composable services work seamlessly together, so your business can adapt to new risks with agility.

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
__Protect developer code__ - Detect and block source code in up/downloads. Scan for code in SaaS apps to mitigate risks of code exposure or theft.

__Meet regulatory requirements__ - Detect and control movement of regulated data. Maintain logs and push to SIEM for audit reports. Reduce attack surface with Zero Trust posture.

__Mitigate data exposure__ - Scan SaaS apps for misconfigurations and sensitive data. Gain visibility over Shadow IT to allow/block access. Lock down access to apps with Zero Trust.

__Generative AI visibility__ - Prevent users from copy/pasting/inputting sensitive data into AI tools like ChatGPT. Take advantage of AI, while keeping it safe.

content.value: Cloudflare helps Applied Systems protect data in AI tools.
Applied Systems runs its own instance of ChatGPT in a Cloudflare isolated browser, which helps block users from oversharing data with the tool.

"We wanted to let employees take advantage of AI while keeping it safe," says Randolph. "We prevent users from copying and pasting sensitive data from other apps into our isolated instance of ChatGPT, which prevents a lot of company info from being exposed to the tool."
More broadly, Cloudflare helps Applied Systems consolidate security across employees, applications, and networks.
Learn more in the case study
"Over the past few years, Cloudflare has been a critical partner in our digital transformation efforts and has helped us consolidate security controls across our users, applications, and networks...
Going forward, we are excited for Cloudflare's continued innovations to protect data, and in particular, their vision and roadmap for services like DLP and CASB."

features.title: Blog: Cloudflare One for Data Protection
features.description: September 07, 2023 | Cloudflare One for Data Protection is our unified suite to protect data everywhere across web, SaaS, and private applications. Built on and delivered across our entire global network, Cloudflare One's data protection suite is architected for the risks of modern coding and AI.

features.title: Blog: Data protection roadmap preview
features.description: September 07, 2023 | Cloudflare One just launched its data protection suite. This blog previews new functionality to protect data and code in SaaS environments with our DLP and CASB services and looks back on what we have built over the past year.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One for Data Protection Hero (White Background)

features.title: Webinar: Data protection recommendations
features.description: This webinar will provide tangible use cases and recommendations for CISOs to modernize their data protection strategy and reduce data risk with Cloudflare One.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Data Protection Webinar Banner

features.title: Infographic: How modern coding, AI, and cloud impact your data protection strategy.
features.description: In this infographic, explore how uniquely modern risks like sprawling cloud and SaaS environments, modern coding practices, and emerging AI tools demand a modern approach to security.

features.title: Solution Brief: Unified protection for data everywhere
features.description: In this brief, learn how Cloudflare One enables more effective, more productive, and more agile data protection. Read about what use cases to prioritize, how our services work, and how customers are getting started.

features.title: Demo: Use Case Walkthrough
features.description: In this demo, see how Cloudflare One helps organizations to comply with regulations, mitigate the risks of data exposure across application environments, and secure developer code.
